net.semanticmetadata.lire.imageanalysis

Class SimpleColorHistogram

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.semanticmetadata.lire.imageanalysis.SimpleColorHistogram
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Histogram, LireFeature

    public class SimpleColorHistogram
extends java.lang.Object
implements LireFeature
    This class provides a simple color histogram for content based image retrieval. Number of bins is configurable, histogram is normalized to 8 bit per bin (0-255).
    Defaults are given in the final fields. Available options are given by the enums.


    Date: 14.05.2008
    Time: 09:47:10

    Author:
    Mathias Lux, mathias@juggle.at

      • getStringRepresentation

        public java.lang.String getStringRepresentation()
        Description copied from interface: LireFeature
        Legacy method from a time, when feature vectors were stored as Strings in Lucene. This is not recommended, as Strings are immutable and therefore a lot of unnecessary object instances are created.
        Specified by:
        getStringRepresentation in interface LireFeature
        Returns:
        the feature vector as String.
